member.name: M:NetworkLib.Connection.DoReceivePacketAsync(System.Net.Sockets.Socket,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Listens for a packet to be received asynchronously within the given timeout, and returns the received packet.
member.param: The remote socket from which to receive data.
The socket flags associated with the read operation.
The timespan within which to wait for a packet, returning a null packet if this limit is exceeded.
member.returns: The packet that was received. if not received correctly.

member.name: M:NetworkLib.Connection.DoReceivePacketFromAsync(System.Net.Sockets.Socket,System.Net.EndPoint,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Listens for a packet to be received asynchronously within the given timeout, and returns the received packet.
member.param: The socket which will receive the packet.
The remote endpoint from which to receive the packet.
The socket flags associated with the read operation.
The timespan within which to wait for a packet, returning a null packet if this limit is exceeded.
member.returns: The packet that was received and the associated transmission result. if not received correctly.

member.name: M:NetworkLib.Connection.DoSendPacketAsync(System.Net.Sockets.Socket,NetworkLib.Packets.Packet,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sends the given packet asynchronously within the given timeout.
member.param: The remote socket to which to send the packet.
The packet to send.
The socket flags associated with the write operation.
The timespan within which to send the packet, returning false if this limit is exceeded.
member.returns: Whether the packet was successfully sent.

The remote endpoint to which to send the packet.
The packet to send.
The socket flags associated with the write operation.
The timespan within which to send the packet, returning false if this limit is exceeded.
member.returns: Whether the packet was successfully sent.

member.name: M:NetworkLib.Extensions.ClientExtensions.SendBytes(NetworkLib.Client,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Sends the given byte buffer to the connected remote endpoint. Blocks until the bytes are all sent, and does not timeout.
member.param: The instance on which this extension method should be called.
The bytes that should be sent to the connected remote endpoint.

member.name: M:NetworkLib.Extensions.ClientExtensions.SendBytes(NetworkLib.Client,System.Byte[],System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sends the given byte buffer to the connected remote endpoint. Blocks until the bytes are all sent, whilst observing a timeout of the given length.
member.param: The instance on which this extension method should be called.
The bytes that should be sent to the connected remote endpoint.
The timeout after which to cancel the transmission attempt.

The bytes that should be sent to the connected remote endpoint.

member.param: The instance on which this extension method should be called.
The bytes that should be sent to the connected remote endpoint.
member.returns: The byte buffer that was received as a response.

member.summary: Sends the given byte buffer to the connected remote endpoint and waits for the response asynchronously. Does not block, and does not timeout.

The bytes that should be sent to the connected remote endpoint.
member.returns: The byte buffer received as a response to the sent buffer.

member.name: M:NetworkLib.Extensions.ClientExtensions.TryBind(NetworkLib.Client,System.Net.IPAddress,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Attempts to synchronously bind the underlying socket to the given local address and port. Blocks. Does not timeout.
member.param: The instance on which this extension method should be called.
The local IP address to bind to. Null if any IP address will suffice.
The local port to bind to. Null if any port will suffice.
member.returns: Whether the binding was successful or not.

member.name: M:NetworkLib.Extensions.ClientExtensions.TryBind(NetworkLib.Client,System.Net.IPAddress,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Attempts to synchronously bind the underlying socket to the given local address and port. Blocks. If the timeout is exceeded the binding attempt is aborted and the method returns false.
member.param: The instance on which this extension method should be called.
The local IP address to bind to. Null if any IP address will suffice.
The local port to bind to. Null if any port will suffice.
The timeout within which to attempt the binding.
member.returns: Whether the binding was successful or not.

member.param: The instance on which this extension method should be called.

The local port to bind to. Null if any port will suffice.
member.returns: Whether the binding was successful or not.

member.returns: Whether the connection was successful or not.

The remote IP address to connect to.

The timeout within which to attempt the connection.
member.returns: Whether the connection was successful or not.

member.name: M:NetworkLib.Extensions.ClientExtensions.TryConnectAsync(NetworkLib.Client,System.Net.IPAddress,System.Int32)

member.name: T:NetworkLib.Interfaces.IClient
member.summary: Describes a client capable of asynchronous communication with an connection.

member.name: E:NetworkLib.Interfaces.IClient.Connected
member.summary: Signifies that a connection with the remote endpoint has been made.

member.name: E:NetworkLib.Interfaces.IClient.Disconnected
member.summary: Signifies that the connection with the remote endpoint was severed.

member.name: M:NetworkLib.Interfaces.IClient.SendBytesAsync(System.Byte[],System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sends the given byte buffer to the connected remote endpoint asynchronously. Does not block, and observes a timeout of the given length. timeout.
member.param: The bytes that should be sent to the connected remote endpoint.
The timeout after which to cancel the transmission attempt.

member.name: M:NetworkLib.Interfaces.IClient.SendBytesWithResponseAsync(System.Byte[],System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sends the given byte buffer to the connected remote endpoint and waits for the response asynchronously. Does not block, and observes a timeout of the given length. timeout.
member.param: The bytes that should be sent to the connected remote endpoint.

The timeout after which to cancel the transmission attempt. This timeout is reused by both the 'send' and 'receive' parts of the transmission attempt, such that the maximum timeout is equal to 2 times the given value.
member.returns: The byte buffer received as a response to the sent buffer.

The local port to bind to.
member.returns: Whether the binding was successful or not.

member.name: M:NetworkLib.Server.TryBind(System.Net.IPAddress,System.Int32,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Attempts to synchronously bind the underlying socket to the given local address and port. Blocks. If the timeout is exceeded the binding attempt is aborted and the method returns false.
member.param: The local IP address to bind to.
The local port to bind to.
The timeout within which to attempt the binding.
member.returns: Whether the binding was successful or not.

member.summary: Attempts to asynchronously bind the underlying socket to the given local address and port. Does not block. Does not timeout.

member.returns: Whether the binding was successful or not.

member.name: T:NetworkLib.Utils.Conversion.NetworkIgnorePropertyAttribute

member.name: T:NetworkLib.Utils.NetworkOperations
member.summary: Helper class for asynchronously performing common network operations, for both the UDP and TCP protocols.

member.name: M:NetworkLib.Utils.NetworkOperations.ReadAsync(System.Net.Sockets.Socket,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Reads the specified amount of data asynchronously from the network, via the given socket. The given are associated with the read, and the given is used to allow for asynchronous task cancellation.
member.param: The socket which should read data from the network.
The number of bytes to read from the network.
The socket flags associated with the receive operation.
The cancellation token to use for asynchronous cancellation.
member.returns: The result of the receive operation.

member.name: M:NetworkLib.Utils.NetworkOperations.ReadFromAsync(System.Net.Sockets.Socket,System.Net.EndPoint,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Reads a datagram asynchronously from the given remote endpoint, via the given socket. The given are associated with the read, and the given is used to allow for asynchronous task cancellation.
member.param: The socket which should read data from the network.
The remote endpoint from which data should be read.
The socket flags associated with the receive operation.
The cancellation token to use for asynchronous cancellation.
member.returns: The result of the receive operation.

member.name: M:NetworkLib.Utils.NetworkOperations.ReadPacketAsync(System.Net.Sockets.Socket,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Reads a packet asynchronously from network, via the given socket. The given are associated with the read, and the given is used to allow for asynchronous task cancellation.
member.param: The socket which should read the packet from the network.
The socket flags associated with the receive operation.
The cancellation token to use for asynchronous cancellation.
member.returns: The read packet.

member.name: M:NetworkLib.Utils.NetworkOperations.ReadPacketFromAsync(System.Net.Sockets.Socket,System.Net.EndPoint,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Reads a packet asynchronously from the given remote endpoint, via the given socket. The given are associated with the read, and the given is used to allow for asynchronous task cancellation.
member.param: The socket which should read the packet from the network.
The remote endpoint from which a packet should be read.
The socket flags associated with the receive operation.
The cancellation token to use for asynchronous cancellation.
member.returns: The read packet and associated transmission results.

member.name: M:NetworkLib.Utils.NetworkOperations.WriteAsync(System.Net.Sockets.Socket,System.ReadOnlyMemory{System.Byte},System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Writes the given buffer asynchronously to the network, via the given socket. The given are associated with the write, and the given is used to allow for asynchronous task cancellation.
member.param: The socket which should write data to the network.
The buffer that should be written to the network.
The socket flags associated with the send operation.
The cancellation token to use for asynchronous cancellation.

member.summary: Writes the given packet asynchronously to the network, via the given socket. The given are associated with the write, and the given is used to allow for asynchronous task cancellation.
member.param: The socket which should write data to the network.
The packet that should be written to the network.
The socket flags associated with the send operation.
The cancellation token to use for asynchronous cancellation.

member.name: M:NetworkLib.Utils.NetworkOperations.WritePacketToAsync(System.Net.Sockets.Socket,System.Net.EndPoint,NetworkLib.Packets.Packet,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Writes the given packet asynchronously to the given remote endpoint, via the given socket. The given are associated with the write, and the given is used to allow for asynchronous task cancellation.
member.param: The socket which should write data to the network.
The remote endpoint to which data should be written.
The packet that should be written to the remote endpoint.
The socket flags associated with the send operation.
The cancellation token to use for asynchronous cancellation.

member.summary: Writes the given buffer asynchronously to the given remote endpoint, via the given socket. The given are associated with the write, and the given is used to allow for asynchronous task cancellation.

The buffer that should be written to the network.

member.summary: Causes a instance to be created as the socket option manager.

member.summary: Whether sending a packet flushes underlying .

member.summary: Whether a checksum should be created for each UDP packet sent.

member.name: P:NetworkLib.Utils.Socket_Options.SocketOptions.IsRoutingEnabled
member.summary: Whether the packet should be sent directly to its destination or allowed to be routed through multiple destinations first.
